name: fathomlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to understand: It was a fathomlessly strange novel that had acquired a cult status. She spent many hours trying to solve a fathomlessly difficult crossword clue.
More examplesFewer examplesIn my opinion, it was one of the most fathomlessly tedious and pretentious films that I have ever seen.I've tried and tried to understand quantum mechanics, but I just find it fathomlessly complicated.Relationships are always fathomlessly complex, which is why we should not rush to judgment.
